name: astro-d1-blog
description: Build a personal website, blog, or portfolio with Astro.

scripts.db:migrate:local: for f in ./migrations/*.sql; do npx wrangler d1 execute blog --local --file="$f"; done
scripts.db:init-full:local: npm run db:migrate:local && npm run db:seed:local
scripts.db:seed:local: npx wrangler d1 execute blog --local --file=./scripts/seed-tags.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute blog --local --file=./scripts/seed-site-config.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute blog --local --file=./scripts/seed-data.sql
scripts.db:migrate:prod: for f in ./migrations/*.sql; do npx wrangler d1 execute blog-demo --remote --file="$f"; done
scripts.db:init:prod: npm run db:migrate:prod && npm run db:seed:prod && npm run db:seed-config:prod
scripts.db:init-full:prod: npm run db:init:prod && npm run db:seed-data:prod
